src.hermes.physics
Class MultisampledMassedBeing

java.lang.Object
  src.hermes.HObject
      src.hermes.Being
          src.hermes.physics.MassedBeing
              src.hermes.physics.MultisampledMassedBeing
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeySubscriber, MouseSubscriber, MouseWheelSubscriber, OscSubscriber
Direct Known Subclasses:
MultisampledMassedBeingTest.TestBeing
public abstract class MultisampledMassedBeing
extends MassedBeing

this extension of MassedBeing provides motion multisampling support for more accurate motion integration and collision detection

Author:
Sam

Constructor Summary
MultisampledMassedBeing(HShape shape, processing.core.PVector velocity, float mass, float elasticity, float sampleLength)
          creates a new MultisampledMassedBeing, same as MassedBeing constructor but for last two arguments uses the default value of 10 for sample length.
MultisampledMassedBeing(HShape shape, processing.core.PVector velocity, float mass, float elasticity, float sampleLength, int maxSamples)
          creates a new MultisampledMassedBeing, same as MassedBeing constructor but for last two arguments
 
Method Summary
 boolean needsMoreSamples()
          whether the being requires more steps on this update -- used for motion multisampling this will always return false, but is overriden by subclasses with multisampling support
 void step()
          updates the being's position and velocity based on the forces applied since the last step, using Euler-Cromer integration

Constructor Detail

MultisampledMassedBeing

public MultisampledMassedBeing(HShape shape,
                               processing.core.PVector velocity,
                               float mass,
                               float elasticity,
                               float sampleLength,
                               int maxSamples)
creates a new MultisampledMassedBeing, same as MassedBeing constructor but for last two arguments

Parameters:
shape - the being's collision shape
velocity - the being's velocity
mass - the being's mass (must be positive)
elasticity - the being's elasticive (should be in [0,1])
sampleLength - the length of the motion sample, ie how for the being has to travel before more samples are needed. The being's shortest spanning length is a reasonable value
maxSamples - the maximum number of samples allowed. If the being can reach a very high speed, this must be very high for motion sampling to work, but this reduces performance. Increasing the sample length allows lower maxSamples values, but decreases accuracy.

MultisampledMassedBeing

public MultisampledMassedBeing(HShape shape,
                               processing.core.PVector velocity,
                               float mass,
                               float elasticity,
                               float sampleLength)
creates a new MultisampledMassedBeing, same as MassedBeing constructor but for last two arguments uses the default value of 10 for sample length.

Parameters:
shape - the being's collision shape
velocity - the being's velocity
mass - the being's mass (must be positive)
elasticity - the being's elasticive (should be in [0,1])
sampleLength - the length of the motion sample, ie how for the being has to travel before more samples are needed. The being's shortest spanning length is a reasonable value

Description copied from class: MassedBeing
whether the being requires more steps on this update -- used for motion multisampling this will always return false, but is overriden by subclasses with multisampling support
